qas.question: What is the speculation of the relationship between doctors and the drug industry?
What is the Physician Financial Transparency Report part of?
Where can you obtain information about the Sunshine Act?

answers.text: Centers for Medicare & Medicaid Services website

qas.question: What information is collected by Centers for Medicine & Medicaid Services?

answers.text: financial relationships with physicians and hospitals.

qas.question: When did Centers for Medicine & Medicaid Services have to start collecting information?
The Physician Financial Transparency Reports was part of what other act?
In what year were Medicaid and Medicare required to disclose information about their relationships with doctors and hospitals?
Where can financial relationships between Medicaid, Medicare and pharmaceutical companies be found?

answers.text: Centers for Medicare & Medicaid Services website

qas.question: What is expected when the relationships are made public?

answers.text: relationship between doctors and Pharmaceutical industry will become fully transparent

qas.question: What is the speculation of the relationship between organizations and the drug industry?

plausible_answers.text: Centers for Medicare & Medicaid Services website

qas.question: Where can you obtain information about organizations?

plausible_answers.text: financial relationships with physicians and hospitals

qas.question: What information is collected by doctors?
When did doctors have to start collecting information?

context: In the US, <a4_0><b13_0>starting in <a6_0>2013<b13_0/><a6_0/><a4_0/>, under the Physician Financial Transparency Reports (part of the <a1_0><a5_0><b10_0>Sunshine Act<b10_0/><a5_0/><a1_0/>), the Centers for Medicare & Medicaid Services has to collect information from applicable manufacturers and group purchasing organizations in order to report information about their <a3_0><b12_0>financial relationships with physicians and hospitals<b12_0/>.<a3_0/> Data are made public in the <a2_0><a7_0><b11_0>Centers for Medicare & Medicaid Services website<b11_0/><a7_0/><a2_0/>. The expectation is that <a8_0>relationship between doctors and Pharmaceutical industry will <a0_0><b9_0>become fully transparent<b9_0/><a8_0/>.
